description: 10-day Daily Cycle Land Surface Temperature (LST10-DC) provides a statistical overview of the LST daily cycle over each 10-day compositing for every image pixel. LST10-DC is useful for the scientific community, namely for those dealing with meteorological and climate models. Accurate values of LST are also of special interest in a wide range of areas related to land surface processes, including meteorology, hydrology, agrometeorology, climatology and environmental studies.
title: Land Surface Temperature: global 10-daily Daily Cycle (raster 5km) - version 1, Dec 2015

providers.name: Copernicus Land Monitoring Service
providers.description: Copernicus Land Monitoring Service - VITO NV
